text.text_translated:
Os Gêmeos are twin brothers. They look the same. They are from São Paulo.
They paint many kinds of art. They paint small street drawings. They also paint very big pictures of people. These pictures have many colours. They paint on buildings.
Their pictures are often very big. So they need cranes. Cranes help them paint.
In 2007, they painted a castle. It was in Scotland. They painted all of it.
